data.title: State Agencies Call On Water Managers to Promote Water Conservation
data.excerpt: With California experiencing its second consecutive dry year, the California Public Utilities Commission (CPUC), the State Water Resources Control Board (State Water Board), and the California Department of Water Resources (DWR) called on local and regional water suppliers to increase their conservation efforts, develop a contingency plan in the event of water supply problems, and … Read more
data.author: Admin
